members.name: FileRequest.lockedFile
members.description: The LockedFile object from which the request was started.

members.name: FileRequest.onprogress
members.description: A callback handler called repeatedly while the operation represented by the FileRequest is in progress.

parameters.name: loaded
parameters.description: A number representing the current amount of bytes processed by the operation.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: A number representing the total amount of bytes that will be processed by the operation.

members.name: DOMRequest.onsuccess
members.description: A callback handler called when the operation represented by the DOMRequest is completed.

members.name: DOMRequest.onerror
members.description: A callback handler that gets called when an error occurs while processing the operation.

members.name: DOMRequest.readyState
members.description: A string indicating whether or not the operation is finished running. Its value is either "done" or "pending".
